name: Nova Wallet
shortDescription: Next gen wallet for Polkadot & Kusama ecosystem
description:
Nova Wallet is next gen application for Polkadot & Kusama ecosystem, transparent & community-oriented, focused on convenient UX/UI, fast performance & security.

Get access to the whole brand new experience of the mobile app for Polkadot and Kusama. Manage all ecosystem tokens, enjoy a convenient Staking experience, and contribute to the Crowdloans with no limits.
